Did the predecessors to trumpets have valves?	No
Did the predecessors to trumpets have valves?	No
Are trumpets constructed of brass?	Yes
Is the bass trumpet the smallest trumpet?	No
What musical styles is the trumpet used in?	Ska, ska punk, classical, jazz, Rock, Blues, pop, polka, cuban music, mariachi and funk.
What is the most common type of trumpet?	The B trumpet.
How does a trumpet produce sound?	By blowing air through closed lips.
How do trumpets compensate for wolf tones?	Somce trumpetes have a slide mechanism built in to compensate.
Did Miles Davis play the trumpet?	Yes
Does a trumpet have a mellower tone than a cornet?	No
